description: Variation (3) on RecamÃ¡n's sequence (A005132): set s (the step size) initially equal to 2; to get a(n), we first try to subtract s from a(n-1): a(n) = a(n-1)-s if positive and not already in the sequence, in which case we change s to s+1; if not, a(n) = a(n-1)+s+i, where i >= 0 is the smallest number such that a(n-1)+s+i has not already appeared and now we change s to s+i+1.
